channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- PaperDisplay Hotkey Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- PaperDisplay Hotkey Service

item.title: CVE-2019-6165|2024-08-04T20:16:24.325Z -- lenovo -- paperdisplay%20hotkey%20service
item.description: A DLL search path vulnerability was reported in PaperDisplay Hotkey Service version 1.2.0.8 that could allow privilege escalation. Lenovo has ended support for PaperDisplay Hotkey software as the Night light feature introduced in Windows 10 Build 1703 provides similar features.
